function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Chronic exposure to air pollution linked to spread of SARS-CoV-2 in Chinese cities.","Impact":"Increased lethality related to COVID-19.","Mitigation":"Reduce air pollution through stricter regulations and use of clean energy sources.","Technologies":"Air quality monitoring systems, emission control technologies, renewable energy technologies.","People":"Individuals chronically exposed to air pollution in large cities, especially in China.","Owner":"Government agencies, environmental organizations, city planners."}]}
